name: Matthew taylor
title: Senior Business Analyst
bio: Matthew is an experienced business analyst with over 10 years of experience in accounting and taxation. He has helped hundreds of students master the fundamentals of business finance.

name: Locked academy
title: Finance Expert
bio: Locked academy is a team of finance professionals dedicated to teaching financial management and planning to students worldwide.

name: Norman miller
title: UI/UX Designer & Developer
bio: Norman is a creative designer and developer with expertise in modern application design. He combines design thinking with technical skills to create amazing user experiences.
